column1:
Worker_Joe,"2010-10-10T17:34:22.43Z","One of the coolest promotional minifigs!","

This promotional minifig has RARE orange parts not found in any other minifig plus he is from the official game. I think he is worth pre-ordering the game.

bmwlego,"2010-10-10T20:50:25.75Z","Exclusive Minifig Worth Adding to your Populous (but at what cost?)","Glad to have this figure in my collection. Was worried I wouldn't get it.

The figure is as pictured. Cool screen printed logo on torso, orange helmet and orange hands are a plus.

1 major disappointment was that he didn't come with oxygen tanks! How does he breathe in outer space?
",TRUE,4,4,5,5,5

Nth_Brick,"2011-08-11T16:39:35.96Z","The Nexus Astronaut","

This is no doubt a really cool little Minifig.
column2: The torso print is unique and fairly exclusive (however, I hear that they are now giving them out to anyone who buys LEGO Universe at the LEGO Store) and it is fairly rare to get orange minifig parts.&nbsp
column3: The head is basically a revamped classic LEGO face with eyebrows, more detailed eyes and a less cheesey smile.&nbsp
column4: He is fairly fun to play with and is a decent little astronaut that can work in pretty much anything.

column2: He is made of the low-quality chinese plastic and really has no vehicles/tools that you can either buy or are included with this thing.&nbsp
column3: That said, he can seem a bit out of place among other astronaut/space minifigs.&nbsp
column4: Also, he was supposed to be a pre-order exclusive.&nbsp
column5: Now, LEGO is giving them away to everyone who buys the discounted game.&nbsp
column6: These late-comers also get a LEGO Universe Rocket AND 2 whole months of free play!&nbsp

column1: So, here's the simple breakdown of the LEGO Universe Nexus Astronaut.

column2: At one point, was exclusive to pre-order.
He is fairly unique and you get his gear in-game with the included code card.
He is no longer an exclusive thanks to LEGO handing these things out like candy to anyone who buys the game.
Made of the dreaded Chinese Plastic.
Can look a bit out of place amidst other minifigs.

column1: In conclusion, this minifig is pretty cool and would be a great addition to any collection.
column2: But, you need to get to a LEGO Store fast to get the great deal they are now offering.&nbsp
column3: Despite LEGO cheating me on this, I have to reccomend this little as a really fun and cool little minifig.
